content.rendered: An unexpected surge in ticket sales during the usually sleepy month of July has left us sold out for the 2018 Brand New Conference. We have started a waitlist that is already 40-people-deep so, at this point, it really is a long shot. Please do not make any further plans — like buying plane tickets — if you don’t have a conference ticket. We are, of course, thrilled with the response but sad that we can not accommodate everyone that wanted to attend. I’ll take this opportunity to state with 100% assurance that, unlike with First Round, we will NOT be changing to a larger venue. At this point your best bet is the live webcast or the videos after the event. Optimistically and in regards to the future, the venue for the 2019 Brand New Conference in [REDACTED] will be plenty big!
